summary: This document is a chain of email correspondence primarily between Joseph E. Nascimento, an attorney with the law firm Ross Amsel Raben Nascimento, PLLC, and a federal prosecutor from the Southern District of New York. The emails discuss scheduling meetings and calls related to a client, with references to a grand jury subpoena, a proffer session, and coordination around a hurricane. The context suggests these communications are part of a legal investigation, likely connected to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Joseph E. Nascimento
persons.context: Attorney from Ross Amsel Raben Nascimento, PLLC, corresponding with a federal prosecutor to schedule meetings and calls regarding a client, referencing a grand jury subpoena and proffer sessions.

persons.name: Alan Ross
persons.context: Deceased former law partner of Joseph Nascimento who previously represented an unnamed individual (client) prior to 2018.

connections.description: Former law partners; Nascimento references Ross as his 'former partner' and took over matters after Ross's death.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Served
events.description: A federal agent served a grand jury subpoena to an individual connected to Alan Ross's former client.

events.title: Meeting at Hilton West Palm Beach
events.description: A meeting was scheduled between Joseph Nascimento and federal prosecutors at the Hilton in West Palm Beach, Florida.

events.title: Proposed Meeting Date
events.description: Federal prosecutors proposed holding a meeting on August 14, 2019, which Nascimento requested be moved to the afternoon.

events.title: Scheduled Proffer Session
events.description: A proffer session (a meeting where a suspect or witness offers information) was scheduled for September 10, 2019, with the client.

events.title: Nascimento International Travel
events.description: Joseph Nascimento notified prosecutors he would be traveling out of the country from September 17-30, 2019.

events.title: Future Meeting Proposed
events.description: In 2021, correspondence continues, with a meeting proposed for September 30 - October 1, 2021.

locations: Miami, Florida 33129 (Lawyer's Plaza, 2250 S.W. 3rd Avenue, 4th Floor)
West Palm Beach, Florida (Hilton on Okeechobee Blvd mentioned as meeting location)
keyFacts: Attorney Joseph Nascimento is communicating with federal prosecutors from the Southern District of New York regarding a client, in the context of a grand jury investigation.
The correspondence references a grand jury subpoena being served on an individual connected to Nascimento's deceased former partner, Alan Ross.
Multiple meetings and a proffer session are scheduled in West Palm Beach, Florida, indicating the client's location or the investigation's focus area.
The emails span from July 2019 to September 2021, showing an extended period of communication and investigation.
The subject line of the emails consistently references "Epstein," strongly linking this legal correspondence to the Jeffrey Epstein case.
